name: Dancho Dimkov
what_you_do: Dancho Dimkov shares practical insights on B2B sales, entrepreneurship, and digital transformation through engaging keynotes, panels, and workshops that provide actionable strategies for business growth.
who_you_serve: Dancho serves entrepreneurs, business leaders, and organizations looking to enhance their business strategies and growth through expert insights and practical advice.
business_focus: Dancho Dimkov shares practical insights on B2B sales, entrepreneurship, and digital transformation through engaging keynotes, panels, and workshops that provide actionable strategies for business growth.
